patthana1.14:1.1_0: Parittārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca parittārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— parittārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.14:1.1_2: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe parittārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.14:2.1_0: Mahaggatārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca mahaggatārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—mahaggatārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.14:3.1_0: Appamāṇārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca appamāṇārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— appamāṇārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.14:4.1_0: Parittārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca parittārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā …
patthana1.14:5.1_0: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
patthana1.14:7.1_0: Parittārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca parittārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā— ahetukaṁ parittārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.14:7.1_2: Ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe parittārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.14:7.1_3: dve khandhā, vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana1.14:8.1_0: Mahaggatārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca mahaggatārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ mahaggatārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.14:8.1_1: dve khandhā, vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana1.14:9.1_0: Appamāṇārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca appamāṇārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ appamāṇārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.14:10.1_0: Parittārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca parittārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—parittārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.14:11.1_0: Mahaggatārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca mahaggatārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—mahaggatārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.14:12.1_0: Appamāṇārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca appamāṇārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—appamāṇārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.14:13.1_0: Parittārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca parittārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati napurejātapaccayā—arūpe parittārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.14:14.1_0: Mahaggatārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca mahaggatārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati napurejātapaccayā—arūpe mahaggatārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.14:15.1_0: Appamāṇārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca appamāṇārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati napurejātapaccayā—arūpe appamāṇārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.14:16.1_0: Parittārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca parittārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā—parittārammaṇe khandhe paṭicca parittārammaṇā cetanā.
patthana1.14:17.1_0: Mahaggatārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca mahaggatārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā—mahaggatārammaṇe khandhe paṭicca mahaggatārammaṇā cetanā.
patthana1.14:18.1_0: Appamāṇārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca appamāṇārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā—appamāṇārammaṇe khandhe paṭicca appamāṇārammaṇā cetanā.
patthana1.14:19.1_0: Parittārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca parittārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati navipākapaccayā (paṭisandhi natthi) …
patthana1.14:19.1_1: najhānapaccayā—pañcaviññāṇasahagataṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.14:19.1_3: namaggapaccayā—ahetukaṁ parittārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.14:20.1_0: Mahaggatārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca mahaggatārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati namaggapaccayā—ahetukaṁ mahaggatārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.14:21.1_0: Appamāṇārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca appamāṇārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati namaggapaccayā—ahetukaṁ appamāṇārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.14:22.1_0: Parittārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca parittārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati navippayuttapaccayā—arūpe parittārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe….
patthana1.14:23.1_0: Mahaggatārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca mahaggatārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati navippayuttapaccayā—arūpe mahaggatārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe….
patthana1.14:24.1_0: Appamāṇārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca appamāṇārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati navippayuttapaccayā—arūpe appamāṇārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.14:25.1_1: napurejāte tīṇi, napacchājāte tīṇi, naāsevane tīṇi, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke tīṇi, najhāne ekaṁ, namagge tīṇi, navippayutte tīṇi.
patthana1.14:27.1_0: Hetupaccayā naadhipatiyā tīṇi, napurejāte tīṇi, napacchājāte tīṇi, naāsevane tīṇi, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke tīṇi, navippayutte tīṇi.
patthana1.14:29.1_0: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe tīṇi, anantare tīṇi, samanantare tīṇi, sahajāte tīṇi, aññamaññe tīṇi, nissaye tīṇi, upanissaye tīṇi, purejāte tīṇi, āsevane dve, kamme tīṇi, vipāke ekaṁ, āhāre tīṇi, indriye tīṇi, jhāne tīṇi, magge dve, sampayutte tīṇi, vippayutte tīṇi, atthiyā tīṇi, natthiyā tīṇi, vigate tīṇi, avigate tīṇi.
patthana1.14:32.1_0: Parittārammaṇo dhammo parittārammaṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo— parittārammaṇā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.14:32.1_1: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe parittārammaṇā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.14:33.1_0: Mahaggatārammaṇo dhammo mahaggatārammaṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo— mahaggatārammaṇā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.14:34.1_0: Appamāṇārammaṇo dhammo appamāṇārammaṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo— appamāṇārammaṇā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.14:35.1_0: Parittārammaṇo dhammo parittārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo— dānaṁ datvā sīlaṁ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṁ katvā taṁ paccavekkhati, pubbe suciṇṇāni paccavekkhati, ariyā parittārammaṇe pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudāciṇṇe kilese jānanti.
patthana1.14:35.1_1: Parittārammaṇe paritte khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati, assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha parittārammaṇo rāgo uppajjati …pe…
patthana1.14:35.1_4: Parittārammaṇā parittā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṁsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.14:36.1_0: Parittārammaṇo dhammo mahaggatārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo— dibbaṁ cakkhuṁ paccavekkhati, dibbaṁ sotadhātuṁ paccavekkhati, parittārammaṇaṁ iddhividhañāṇaṁ paccavekkhati, cetopariyañāṇaṁ …pe…
patthana1.14:36.1_5: vipassati, assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha mahaggatārammaṇo rāgo uppajjati …pe…
patthana1.14:36.1_8: Parittārammaṇā mahaggatā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, anāgataṁsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.14:37.1_0: Mahaggatārammaṇo dhammo mahaggatārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—viññāṇañcāyatanaṁ paccavekkhati, nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṁ paccavekkhati, mahaggatārammaṇaṁ iddhividhañāṇaṁ paccavekkhati, cetopariyañāṇaṁ …pe…
patthana1.14:37.1_5: vipassati, assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha mahaggatārammaṇo rāgo uppajjati …pe…
patthana1.14:37.1_8: Mahaggatārammaṇā mahaggatā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṁsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.14:38.1_0: Mahaggatārammaṇo dhammo parittārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo— paṭhamajjhānapaccavekkhaṇaṁ paccavekkhati …pe…
patthana1.14:38.1_1: nevasaññānāsaññāyatanapaccavekkhaṇaṁ paccavekkhati, dibbacakkhupaccavekkhaṇaṁ paccavekkhati, dibbasotadhātupaccavekkhaṇaṁ paccavekkhati, iddhividhañāṇapaccavekkhaṇaṁ …pe…
patthana1.14:38.1_5: anāgataṁsañāṇapaccavekkhaṇaṁ paccavekkhati, ariyā mahaggatārammaṇe pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudāciṇṇe kilese jānanti.
patthana1.14:38.1_7: vipassati, assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha parittārammaṇo rāgo uppajjati …pe…
patthana1.14:38.1_10: Mahaggatārammaṇā parittā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṁsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.14:39.1_0: Appamāṇārammaṇo dhammo appamāṇārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo— ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ paccavekkhanti, phalaṁ paccavekkhanti.
patthana1.14:39.1_2: Appamāṇārammaṇā appamāṇā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, anāgataṁsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.14:40.1_0: Appamāṇārammaṇo dhammo parittārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo— ariyā gotrabhuṁ paccavekkhanti, vodānaṁ paccavekkhanti, maggapaccavekkhaṇaṁ paccavekkhanti, phalapaccavekkhaṇaṁ paccavekkhanti, nibbānapaccavekkhaṇaṁ paccavekkhanti.
patthana1.14:40.1_3: Appamāṇārammaṇā parittā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṁsañāṇassa āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.14:41.1_0: Appamāṇārammaṇo dhammo mahaggatārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—ariyā appamāṇārammaṇaṁ cetopariyañāṇaṁ paccavekkhanti, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇaṁ paccavekkhanti, anāgataṁsañāṇaṁ paccavekkhanti.
patthana1.14:41.1_2: Appamāṇārammaṇaṁ mahaggatā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, anāgataṁsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.14:42.1_0: Parittārammaṇo dhammo parittārammaṇassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati.
patthana1.14:42.1_1: **Ārammaṇādhipati**—dānaṁ datvā sīlaṁ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṁ katvā taṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhati, pubbe suciṇṇāni garuṁ katvā paccavekkhati, parittārammaṇe paritte khandhe garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā parittārammaṇo rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana1.14:43.1_0: Parittārammaṇo dhammo mahaggatārammaṇassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.14:43.1_1: **Ārammaṇādhipati**—dibbaṁ cakkhuṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhati, dibbaṁ sotadhātuṁ …pe…
patthana1.14:43.1_7: Parittārammaṇe mahaggate khandhe garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā mahaggatārammaṇo rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana1.14:44.1_0: Mahaggatārammaṇo dhammo mahaggatārammaṇassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati.
patthana1.14:44.1_7: Mahaggatārammaṇe mahaggate khandhe garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā mahaggatārammaṇo rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana1.14:45.1_0: Mahaggatārammaṇo dhammo parittārammaṇassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.14:45.1_3: Mahaggatārammaṇe paritte khandhe garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā parittārammaṇo rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana1.14:46.1_0: Appamāṇārammaṇo dhammo appamāṇārammaṇassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati.
patthana1.14:46.1_1: **Ārammaṇādhipati**—ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti, phalaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti.
patthana1.14:47.1_0: Appamāṇārammaṇo dhammo parittārammaṇassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.14:47.1_1: **Ārammaṇādhipati**—sekkhā gotrabhuṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti, vodānaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti, maggapaccavekkhaṇaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti, phalapaccavekkhaṇaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti, nibbānapaccavekkhaṇaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti.
patthana1.14:48.1_0: Appamāṇārammaṇo dhammo mahaggatārammaṇassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.14:49.1_0: Parittārammaṇo dhammo parittārammaṇassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo— purimā purimā parittārammaṇā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ parittārammaṇānaṁ khandhānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.14:50.1_0: Parittārammaṇo dhammo mahaggatārammaṇassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo— parittārammaṇaṁ cuticittaṁ mahaggatārammaṇassa upapatticittassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.14:50.1_1: Parittārammaṇaṁ bhavaṅgaṁ mahaggatārammaṇāya āvajjanāya anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.14:50.1_2: Parittārammaṇā khandhā mahaggatārammaṇassa vuṭṭhānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.14:51.1_0: Parittārammaṇo dhammo appamāṇārammaṇassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo— parittārammaṇaṁ bhavaṅgaṁ appamāṇārammaṇāya āvajjanāya anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.14:52.1_0: Mahaggatārammaṇo dhammo mahaggatārammaṇassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—purimā purimā mahaggatārammaṇā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ mahaggatārammaṇānaṁ khandhānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.14:53.1_0: Mahaggatārammaṇo dhammo parittārammaṇassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo— mahaggatārammaṇaṁ cuticittaṁ parittārammaṇassa upapatticittassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.14:53.1_1: Mahaggatārammaṇaṁ bhavaṅgaṁ parittārammaṇāya āvajjanāya anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.14:53.1_2: Mahaggatārammaṇā khandhā parittārammaṇassa vuṭṭhānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.14:54.1_0: Mahaggatārammaṇo dhammo appamāṇārammaṇassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—mahaggatārammaṇaṁ bhavaṅgaṁ appamāṇārammaṇāya āvajjanāya anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.14:54.1_4: nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassa nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṁ phalasamāpattiyā anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.14:55.1_0: Appamāṇārammaṇo dhammo appamāṇārammaṇassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo— purimā purimā appamāṇārammaṇā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ appamāṇārammaṇānaṁ khandhānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.14:56.1_0: Appamāṇārammaṇo dhammo parittārammaṇassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo— maggapaccavekkhaṇaṁ parittārammaṇassa vuṭṭhānassa …
patthana1.14:57.1_0: Appamāṇārammaṇo dhammo mahaggatārammaṇassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—maggapaccavekkhaṇaṁ mahaggatārammaṇassa vuṭṭhānassa …
patthana1.14:58.1_0: Parittārammaṇo dhammo parittārammaṇassa dhammassa samanantarapaccayena paccayo. (Anantarasadisaṁ.)
patthana1.14:59.1_0: Parittārammaṇo dhammo parittārammaṇassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.14:60.1_0: Parittārammaṇo dhammo parittārammaṇassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana1.14:60.1_5: samāpattiṁ uppādeti, mānaṁ jappeti, diṭṭhiṁ gaṇhāti.
patthana1.14:60.1_11: kāyikaṁ dukkhaṁ upanissāya dānaṁ deti, sīlaṁ …pe…
patthana1.14:60.1_23: patthanāya, kāyikassa sukhassa, kāyikassa dukkhassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.14:61.1_0: Parittārammaṇo dhammo mahaggatārammaṇassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana1.14:61.1_1: **Pakatūpanissayo**—parittārammaṇaṁ saddhaṁ upanissāya mahaggatārammaṇaṁ jhānaṁ uppādeti, vipassanaṁ …pe…
patthana1.14:61.1_3: samāpattiṁ uppādeti, mānaṁ jappeti, diṭṭhiṁ gaṇhāti.
patthana1.14:61.1_7: kāyikaṁ sukhaṁ, kāyikaṁ dukkhaṁ upanissāya mahaggatārammaṇaṁ jhānaṁ uppādeti, vipassanaṁ …pe…
patthana1.14:61.1_9: samāpattiṁ uppādeti, mānaṁ jappeti, diṭṭhiṁ gaṇhāti.
patthana1.14:61.1_11: kāyikaṁ sukhaṁ, kāyikaṁ dukkhaṁ, mahaggatārammaṇāya saddhāya …pe…

patthana1.14:69.1_0: Parittārammaṇo dhammo parittārammaṇassa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo— purimā purimā parittārammaṇā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ parittārammaṇānaṁ khandhānaṁ āsevanapaccayena paccayo.

patthana1.14:74.1_0: Parittārammaṇo dhammo parittārammaṇassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo— sahajātā, nānākkhaṇikā.
patthana1.14:74.1_3: **Nānākkhaṇikā**—parittārammaṇā cetanā vipākānaṁ parittārammaṇānaṁ khandhānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.14:75.1_0: Mahaggatārammaṇo dhammo mahaggatārammaṇassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo— sahajātā, nānākkhaṇikā.
patthana1.14:75.1_3: **Nānākkhaṇikā**—mahaggatārammaṇā cetanā vipākānaṁ mahaggatārammaṇānaṁ khandhānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.

patthana1.14:78.1_0: Appamāṇārammaṇo dhammo parittārammaṇassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.14:78.1_1: **Nānākkhaṇikā**—appamāṇārammaṇā cetanā vipākānaṁ parittārammaṇānaṁ khandhānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.14:79.1_0: Parittārammaṇo dhammo parittārammaṇassa dhammassa vipākapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.14:80.1_0: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe satta, adhipatiyā satta, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte tīṇi, aññamaññe tīṇi, nissaye tīṇi, upanissaye nava, āsevane pañca, kamme pañca, vipāke tīṇi, āhāre tīṇi, indriye jhāne magge sampayutte atthiyā tīṇi, natthiyā nava, vigate nava, avigate tīṇi.
patthana1.14:82.1_0: Parittārammaṇo dhammo parittārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.14:83.1_0: Parittārammaṇo dhammo mahaggatārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.14:84.1_0: Parittārammaṇo dhammo appamāṇārammaṇassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.14:85.1_0: Mahaggatārammaṇo dhammo mahaggatārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.14:86.1_0: Mahaggatārammaṇo dhammo parittārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.14:87.1_0: Mahaggatārammaṇo dhammo appamāṇārammaṇassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.14:88.1_0: Appamāṇārammaṇo dhammo appamāṇārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.14:89.1_0: Appamāṇārammaṇo dhammo parittārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.14:90.1_0: Appamāṇārammaṇo dhammo mahaggatārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.14:91.1_0: Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava, naadhipatiyā nava, naanantare nava, nasamanantare nava, nasahajāte nava, naaññamaññe nava, nanissaye nava, naupanissaye satta, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava …pe…
patthana1.14:91.1_1: namagge nava, nasampayutte nava, navippayutte nava, noatthiyā nava, nonatthiyā nava, novigate nava, noavigate nava.
patthana1.14:93.1_0: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā naanantare nasamanantare naupanissaye napurejāte napacchājāte naāsevane tīṇi …pe…
patthana1.14:95.1_0: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe satta, adhipatiyā satta, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte tīṇi, aññamaññe tīṇi, nissaye tīṇi, upanissaye nava, āsevane pañca, kamme pañca, vipāke tīṇi …pe…
patthana1.14:95.1_1: sampayutte tīṇi, atthiyā tīṇi, natthiyā nava, vigate nava, avigate tīṇi.
